net.sf.clickclick.control.paginator
Class SimplePaginator

java.lang.Object
  AbstractControl
      net.sf.clickclick.control.paginator.SimplePaginator

public class SimplePaginator
extends AbstractControl

Provides an independant paginator control.

The Paginator is based on this article: http://woork.blogspot.com/2008/03/perfect-pagination-style-using-css.html.

Pre defined styles

The paginator CSS style sheet, ("/clickclick/core/paginator/SimplePaginator.css"), defines the following predefined styles:
  • pagination-digg
  • pagination-clean
  • pagination-flickr

Author:
Bob Schellink

Predefined paginator CSS classes are:

  • pagination-digg
  • pagination-clean
  • pagination-flickr

calcPageTotal

public void calcPageTotal(int pageSize,
                          int rows)
Provides a public method that calculates the pageTotal from the given pageSize and total number of rows. 
 public MyPage() {
     int currentPage = 1;
     int pageSize = 10;
     int rowCount = 3000;
     SimplePaginator paginator = new SimplePaginator("my-paginator");
     paginator.setCurrentPage(currentPage);
     paginator.calcPageTotal(pageSize, rowCount);
 }

Parameters:
pageSize - the number of rows per page
rows - the number of rows to paginate over
